title: Bradley Tusk: "The Fixer"
description: This book is a look at the intersection of politics, tech, and business, written by someone who stood there and worked hard. Michael talks with Bradley Tusk, author of "The Fixer: My Adventures Saving Startups from Death by Politics." Original air date 10-05-18. The book was published on 18 September 2018.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Bradley Tusk, Michael Smerconish)
